title: Jesus Christ these Bork Changes are godawful
body:
http://puu.sh/tSWXn/ed27bb1359.jpg
You make the item worse for the champions that normally want the item and then gut the active on top of that?
The hell
The active is now only a crappy slow/self haste on a fucking **_90 SECONDS_** Cooldown with no damage

Keep in mind Cutlass' other upgrade, Gunblade, does absurd damage + a slow on half the cooldown of BORK
